statements: SELECT * FROM player_interactions
SELECT player_id, interaction_type FROM player_interactions
SELECT timestamp, interaction_type FROM player_interactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id = 1234
SELECT interaction_id, message FROM player_interactions ORDER BY interaction_id ASC
SELECT * FROM player_interactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT player_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT interaction_id, player_id, interaction_type FROM player_interactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY interaction_id DESC
SELECT player_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM player_interactions GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_interactions > 5 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC
SELECT player_id, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_interaction FROM player_interactions GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY latest_interaction DESC
SELECT * FROM player_interactions
SELECT player_id, interaction_type FROM player_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC
SELECT player_id, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id = 123
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM player_interactions
SELECT player_id, MAX(interaction_timestamp) AS latest_interaction FROM player_interactions GROUP BY player_id
SELECT player_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_type='login' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT player_id, sender_id, receiver_id, message_content FROM player_communication WHERE sender_id=1001 AND receiver_id=2002 ORDER BY message_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND interaction_timestamp < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY player_id ASC LIMIT 20
SELECT player_id, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_type='purchase' AND LENGTH(interaction_details) > 100 ORDER BY player_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT player_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp, interaction_details FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_type='interaction' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 15
SELECT * FROM player_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, interaction_type FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id = 10;
SELECT MAX(interaction_timestamp) AS last_interaction FROM player_interactions;
SELECT * FROM player_messages WHERE message_id = 5;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_warnings FROM player_warnings GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY total_warnings DESC;
SELECT player_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id = 5 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_warnings WHERE warning_timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY player_id, warning_timestamp;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_warnings FROM player_warnings GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_warnings > 3;

SELECT p.player_id, pm.message_text, pw.warning_reason FROM player_messages pm INNER JOIN player_warnings pw ON pm.player_id = pw.player_id INNER JOIN player_interactions p ON pm.player_id = p.player_id WHERE pm.message_timestamp > '2021-05-01';

SELECT DISTINCT p.player_id, pm.message_text, pw.warning_reason FROM player_messages pm INNER JOIN player_warnings pw ON pm.player_id = pw.player_id INNER JOIN player_interactions p ON pm.player_id = p.player_id ORDER BY p.player_id ASC, warning_reason DESC, message_text;
SELECT * FROM player_interactions;
SELECT player_id, interaction_time, interaction_type FROM player_interactions ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT communication_id, sender_id, receiver_id, communication_content FROM player_communications WHERE communication_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, warning_time, warning_reason FROM player_warnings WHERE player_id = 123;
SELECT action_id, moderator_id, target_player_id, action_time, action_type FROM moderation_actions WHERE action_type = 'ban';
SELECT * FROM player_interactions ORDER BY interaction_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_id, interaction_type FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id = 1001;
SELECT MAX(warning_time) AS latest_warning_time FROM player_warnings WHERE player_id = 2005;
SELECT action_id, action_description FROM moderation_actions WHERE moderator_id = 5003 ORDER BY action_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT communication_id, communication_time, sender_id, receiver_id FROM player_communications WHERE communication_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY communication_time DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM Player;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM Player WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT game_name, game_category FROM Game ORDER BY game_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, game_id, interaction_type FROM Interaction WHERE interaction_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM Communication WHERE comm_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Player;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM Player WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT game_name, game_category FROM Game ORDER BY game_id DESC;
SELECT player_name, game_name, interaction_type FROM Player INNER JOIN Interaction ON Player.player_id = Interaction.player_id;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM Communication WHERE comm_id = 2;
